```{r}
#load libraries
library(GGally)
library(skimr)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# look at penguins data
view(penguins)
```

```{r}
#view column names
names(penguins)

#check the dimensions of the dataframe
dim(penguins)

#get a summary
summary(penguins)
```

```{r}
# get a summary using skimr
skimr::skim(penguins)
```

```{r}
#print the first 6 rows
head(penguins)

#print the last 6 rows
tail(penguins)
```

```{r}
#make a pair plot
GGally::ggpairs(penguins)
```

```{r}
# Make a pairsplot with a select number of columns and color by species ----
GGally::ggpairs(penguins, columns = 3:6, ggplot2::aes(colour = species))
```

```{r}
#make a histogram of penguins flipper lengths
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = flipper_length_mm, fill = species)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
